message.content:
cs.DL, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.IR, cs.SOC

This paper discusses the use of social media in academia and altmetrics, which are relevant to several sub-categories in computer science. cs.DL (Digital Libraries) is the most likely category as it deals with scholarly communication and information retrieval. cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) is also likely as it covers social media platforms. cs.CY (Computers and Society) is relevant as the paper discusses the implications of social media integration in the scholarly communication system. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is relevant as the paper discusses data collection and methodological limitations of altmetrics. cs.SOC (Social Computing) is relevant as the paper discusses the use of social media in academia.
